experiences.name: Alloy
experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
items: Working in Policy Experience/Dashboard team
Leading Front-end Service Architecture work
Led Front-end build working group, delivered the first stage of pipeline overhaul leading to build time reduction achievements (up to 50%), runtime enhancements.
Facilitated Redux working group and delivered the first spec pattern and implementation.
Implemented a new modern icon renderer/transpilation pipeline with an automatic view box adjustment.

experiences.name: Aetna, Analytics & Behavior Change
experiences.title: Senior Web Engineer
items: Led the web engineering team and engineering initiatives for self-service API backend services and web front-end application.

Led the major front-end development of migrating the legacy web front-end and outdated architecture into a redesigned modern React front-end SPA architecture. (Led engineering initiative/architecture and developed most of the new code)
Led self-servicing API service (Node.js) refactor design.
Established web engineering patterns and practices.
Leading web engineering patterns and practices on a high-level for the team.
Worked with a product manager for conducting customer UX research for building user personas, UX initiatives/workflow.
Identified feature/experience gaps and led front-end UI/UX development for features.

Designed and developed a UI core processing engine that performs schema model composition, custom model abstraction, delta chunk rendering and dispatch using tree address structure, dynamic quality evaluation/rule-driven suggestion post-processing pipeline — avg. 500% faster on visualizing/rendering JSON configuration data of 40K lines.

Designed and developed a Journey Flow Builder with free-form canvas, drag-and-draw experience, automatic step flow routing with dynamic sequence index assignment, automatic flow error detection/correction, step flow route aggregation and route branching.
Designed and developed dynamic object renderers with automatic layout composition based on object type and module characteristics.

Designed and developed an in-house UI components based on design system and an overlay rendering component/context that consists of context menu, popover, modal, and window with dynamic depth and layout positioning.

experiences.name: Rally Rd. (RSE Markets)
experiences.title: Software Engineer (Front-end/Full-stack)
items: Primary engineer and maintainer of the main React web front-end and Android PWA application codebase for its alternative asset investing web application.
Maintained/updated git repository strategy along with CI pipeline configuration to have succinct commit history, better branch merge/conflict management, and CI test hook integration (CircleCI).
Introduced a new network connection error handler for a better detection/user-bound error messaging
Developed a custom gesture-based carousel component for Web and Android for asset browsing experience
Developed a custom modal view controller optimized for Web/Android

experiences.name: Toast Labs
experiences.title: Full-stack Lead/Founder
items: Led a technology startup company that developed and launched mobile applications, including “#Newsrooms”, which provided a solution for journalistic bias through an automatically generated news briefing.
Custom-designed hybrid UI framework for the products in JavaScript.
Developed a Node.js/MongoDB backend running a number of RESTful API endpoints and a custom natural language processing pipeline for “#Newsrooms”.
Designed the user experience of the products.
Custom-designed geofence engine for low-power location tracking in Objective-C: geofence target prediction/calculation based on real-time movement data
